name: Chicken Revolution2: Zombie
description:
Zombies come back!

[Chicken Revolution: Zombies] is a defense game to keep the base camp from zombie chickens, joining humanity and chickens.

The long war of humanity and chickens connected by Chicken Revolution ends with the advent of the zombie chickens. Zombie chickens that appeared suddenly attack and infect all living things including humanity and chickens. People and chickens managed to survive cooperate with each other for survival...


Characteristics
-400 stages such easy, normal, hard, special and so on provisin.
-The skill with powerful hitting sense
-Various sub skills and entire skills
-[Allies]' system emerged newly
-Zombie chickens with various features
-The emergence of the powerful boss!
